title: Letterhead, "Letterhead for Ralph Samuels, Photography, Los Angeles", before 1955
medium: Lithography in black and grey ink on off-white laid paper
inscribed:
Imprinted across the top in black ink: RALPH SAMUELS, Photography
At bottom: 854 1/2 SOUTH ROBERTSON BOULEVARD LOS ANGELES- CRESTVIEW 6-9302
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: Preceding the company name is a black and grey logo of squares and circles aranged to look like a camera.

tombstone.epitaph:
Letterhead, "Letterhead for Ralph Samuels, Photography, Los Angeles", before 1955.
before 1955. Lithography in black and grey ink on off-white laid paper. Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff. 1993-31-156.
